Question & Options:
What accolade was 'Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan' nominated for at the AACTA Awards in 2020?
Options:
A. Best Picture
B. Best Asian Film
C. Best Director
D. Best Actor

Options:
A. Hitesh Kewalya
B. Rajkummar Rao
C. Ayushmann Khurrana
D. Kartik Aaryan

In the movie 'Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan' released in 2020, which actor was nominated for the Best Actor award at the Filmfare Awards?
Options:
A. Ayushmann Khurrana
B. Rajkummar Rao
C. Vicky Kaushal
D. Ranveer Singh

In the movie 'Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan' released in 2020, for which accolade was Gajraj Rao nominated?
Options:
A. Best Actor at the National Awards
B. Best Supporting Actor at the Filmfare Awards
C. Best Director at the Filmfare Awards
D. Best Screenplay at the National Awards
Correct Answer: Best Supporting Actor at the Filmfare Awards
